data.name: Draw an X
data.description:
# Draw an X

You have to implement a simple function that require an integer "n" and draw an "x" using `n x n` characters (rows and columns). So `draw(20) have to return a string with 20 rows and 20 columns.

Here an example:

```
X.draw(20)
X                  X
 X                X 
  X              X  
   X            X   
    X          X    
     X        X     
      X      X      
       X    X       
        X  X        
         XX         
         XX         
        X  X        
       X    X       
      X      X      
     X        X     
    X          X    
   X            X   
  X              X  
 X                X 
X                  X
```
